title: Sri Lanka Boutique Central Highlands Tea Bungalow Hideaway with Butler Service
description: Sri Lanka's breathtaking Central Highlands play host to Nine Skies, a refurbished colonial tea bungalow with luxe touches, including butler service. This exclusive retreat offers panoramic views of the lush tea gardens and misty mountains. Explore the famous Nine Arches Bridge, hike up Ella Rock and stroll the tea-lined hills of Demodara. Dine on exquisite local cuisine at the hotel's renowned restaurant or unwind with a dip in the infinity pool.
offer_address: Nine Skies Bungalow, Demodara 90080, Sri Lanka
